about_the_game:
Embark on an enchanting adventure as a fledgling witch. You awaken on a world where magic is a tool for creativity, exploration, and connection. Build, Explore, and collect ingredients to craft spells.

Explore a vibrant, hand-crafted world brimming with secrets, enchanted creatures, and rich history. Along the way, you’ll interact with unique creatures, both mundane and magical alike. Grant wishes and help develop towns at Witching Wells. Watch the towns, and your relationship with their denizens, grow. 

Dynamic Magic System

  • Combine spells and ingredients to create powerful new spells:
    Basic spells can be created and combined to create new spells altogether. Mix the glow spell with the Color spell and a touch of light from the full moon and you get the Neon spell. Discover and experiment with many other combinations, both powerful and unorthodox.

  • A Magic Sandbox:
    The entire world is your magical sandbox—every object can be affected by your spells. Change the weather, grow a glowing forest overnight, levitate entire villages. Every element of the world is interactive, its potential only limited by your creativity.

  • Transform objects with your magic:
    Create flying brooms, magical plants that grow unnatural ingredients, gardening tools that work twice as fast, and many more. Hundreds of hidden behaviors lurk within your possessions and furniture, unlock them with the right spell and a tap of your wand!

Customize your own Witches Den!

  • Build anywhere: Choose the perfect spot in the world to build your magical home. So long as you're willing to endure any hazards or existing residents, every inch of the world is available real estate!

  • Style it to your liking: Craft and customize everything in your den. Create your personal haven according to your tastes, equipped with whatever you decide.

  • Collect functional furniture: From shelves and signs, to cauldrons and wand-crafting stations. Collect functional furniture to aid you in your witchy pursuits!

Towns and Wishes

  • Grant Wishes:
    Mortals will ask for your magical assistance. Constructing a house built to their specifications, delivering a cake to a friend that lives far away, warding away threats to the town on a full moon, and many other requests that only a witch can handle. Fellow Witches may ask for your help in their endeavors as well. As you grant wishes, you grow closer with others, revealing new storylines, gifts, and interactions.

  • Watch towns evolve:
    Some wishes cause towns to grow and change dynamically. Make choices about who moves in, what kinds of buildings are constructed, and how the culture of the town evolves.

  • Create your own hub:
    Need a place to buy alchemical ingredients? Befriend a Potion Shop owner and convince them to open a store in your nearby town. More stone for new buildings? Help a quarrier move in. Grow towns and their functions according to your needs.

Exploration and Discovery

  • A World of Wonders:
    Venture across a vast landscape, each corner of the world offering its own unique environment, lore, and challenges. From tranquil forests to mysterious ruins, every location is brimming with hidden secrets, collectibles, treasures, and stories to uncover.

  • Engage in Minigames and Challenges:
    The world of Witching Well is filled with delightful surprises. Partake in local festivals, Test your skills in various magical minigames found around the world, help creatures solve their own quirky problems; there's always something fun and rewarding around the corner.

  • Dynamic Living Ecosystem:
    The world responds to your actions. Seasons shift, weather patterns change, and creatures roam freely, reacting to your spells and presence. Your interactions with the world shape the environment.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mojave 10.14+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: Welcome to 'Witching Well,' a magical world where creativity thrives. Master unusual and powerful magic and use it to shape the world around you. Build, decorate and create vibrant villages filled with unique characters. Grant wishes, make friends, and have fun. Your journey begins!
